content: Net sales in the second quarter of fiscal ‘22 were record $53 million, an 80% increase from $30 million in the same year ago period, and up 5% from $51 million in our first quarter of 2022. In this market, we realized an 82% year-over-year increase in net sales to approximately $7 million in the second quarter of fiscal 2022 and delivered a 95% increase in trailing 12-month net sales to approximately $28 million. Gross profit in the second quarter of fiscal 2022 increased 79% to approximately $23 million, or 43% of net sales from approximately $13 million or 43.6% of net sales in the same year ago quarter.
